column5: I am heading up to Indian Lake in a couple of weeks. Does anyone have any information for this lake the surrounding lakes in the area. Thanks for any input.

What kind of information are you looking for? I can probably provide whatever info you need. Sounds like we'll be up there at the same time.81SalukiP.S. Just curious ... Where are you staying? Is this your first trip to the Indian Lake chain?
Check you private messages in the upper right hand corner of your screen.
